translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding case file {{.casefile_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}. Click here to view this action.
Action completed
New action request! {{.action_title}}.
New action request
The following action was assigned to you: {{.action_title}}. Accept and complete this action in the app 'ActionChanger' on your mobile device.
An action has been assigned to you
The action {{.action_title}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}. Click here to view this action.
Action completed
{{.assignee}} accepted an action you assigned ({{.action_title}}). Click here to view this action.
Action accepted
{{.assignee}} rejected and re-assigned this action to you ({{.action_title}}). Click here to view this action.
Action rejected
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}
Action almost overdue
The following action is almost overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}. Click here to view this action.
Action almost overdue
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}.
Action overdue
Warning! The following action is overdue: {{.action_title}}, assigned to {{.assignee}}. Click here to view this action.
Action overdue
{{.owner}} has reassigned the action {{.action_title}} to someone else. You are no longer responsible.
Action reassigned
A new permission was given to you. You can now use {{.app_name}} as a/an {{.role}}. Click here to go to {{.app_name}}.
Your administrator has reset your password. Click here to create a new password.

translation.one: Successfully imported {{.number}} user. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.
translation.other: Successfully imported {{.number}} users. Click here to open AdminChanger and manage users.

translation: A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. Click here to view this observation.
New observation

A new observation with severity {{.severity}} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection '{{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}'. Click here to view this observation.

Hi! Welcome to Observations!

translation.other: A report was shared with you by {{.sender}} showing {{.X}} over {{.Y}} for {{.number}} Locations. Click here to view it in ReportChanger.

translation: How are you doing? We noticed you didn’t login yet. Satisfied? Questions? Reach out to support. Busy? We hope you’ll find time to use our great product. Click here to discover SafetyChanger.
